title: CAA Executive Shawn Costner on Diversity
itunes:title: CAA Executive Shawn Costner on Diversity
description:
Hosts Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu and special guest host Damian Sassower chat about LIV Golf poaching talent from the PGA Tour, human rights concerns with FIFA. Plus, they have an extended conversation with CAA Executive Shawn Costner on his career, the sports industry, and his work heading up a diversity initiative at CAA.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
